metadata.title: Frequently asked questions | BookaBand
metadata.description: Find answers to common questions about BookaBand and how it helps musicians, clients, and providers connect and manage bookings.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about BookaBand

what.question: What is BookaBand?
what.answer: BookaBand is a comprehensive platform designed to help musicians, clients, and providers connect and manage bookings. It offers tools for profile creation, booking management, proposal handling, and secure payments.

who.question: Who can use BookaBand?
who.answer: BookaBand is for musicians, event clients, and technical providers. Whether you are an artist looking for gigs, a client organizing an event, or a provider offering services, BookaBand can help you connect and manage your engagements.

cost.question: How much does BookaBand cost?
cost.answer: BookaBand offers a free basic plan for all users. Additional premium features and promotional options are available for musicians and providers. See our pricing page for more details.

profiles.question: How can I create a professional profile?
profiles.answer: Musicians and providers can easily create profiles that showcase their services, experience, and availability to attract clients.

booking.question: How does booking work?
booking.answer: Clients can search for musicians and providers, create booking requests, and manage all communications and contracts within the platform.

payments.question: Is payment secure?
payments.answer: Yes, BookaBand uses secure payment gateways and offers escrow services to protect both parties until the event is completed.

devices.question: What devices are supported?
devices.answer: BookaBand is a web-based platform accessible on any modern browser. A mobile-friendly version is also available for easy access on smartphones and tablets.

security.question: How secure is my data?
security.answer: Your data is encrypted, regularly backed up, and protected by industry-standard security practices. We do not share your information with third parties.

support.question: How can I get help?
support.answer: You can reach our support team via email, live chat, or consult our help center for detailed guides and FAQs.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
